title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.65 - Drivers required to report arrival and departure and pay fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.65 - Drivers required to report arrival and departure and pay fees

State Regulations

Unless other applicable provision for reports is made
in an agreement with a carrier, each driver of a bus of any carrier shall
report to the Port Authority dispatcher immediately upon arrival at the
terminal, shall pay all fees required, shall give information of the expected
time of departure, and shall, immediately before departure, check out at the
office of the superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.65

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
